description: This file defines a collection of small, minimal React components intended for interactive UI demos. The components showcase various UI elements like grids, containers, sections, cards, typography, lists, media, buttons, badges, avatars, alerts, tags, chips, tooltips, navigation, forms, tables, and more. It relies solely on React and Tailwind CSS for styling, serving as a demonstration or testing component set within the project.

methods.name: GridDemo()
methods.description: Renders a simple grid with six boxes labeled Box 1 through Box 6.

methods.name: ContainerDemo()
methods.description: Displays a responsive container with centered content.

methods.name: SectionDemo()
methods.description: Displays a section element with a heading and content.

methods.name: CardDemo()
methods.description: Displays a simple card with a title, content, and an action button.

methods.name: TypographyDemo()
methods.description: Shows various heading and paragraph texts demonstrating typography styles.

methods.name: ListsDemo()
methods.description: Displays a bulleted list of two items.

methods.name: MediaDemo()
methods.description: Displays an image with a caption inside a bordered figure.

methods.name: ButtonsDemo()
methods.description: Shows various styled buttons including primary, secondary, warning, and danger.

methods.name: BadgesDemo()
methods.description: Displays two color-coded badges labeled Info and Success.

methods.name: AvatarsDemo()
methods.description: Displays a user avatar with name and role.

methods.name: AlertsDemo()
methods.description: Displays an informational alert box.

methods.name: TagsDemo()
methods.description: Displays tags with labels Tag and UI.

methods.name: ChipsDemo()
methods.description: Displays chips with labels React and Tailwind with close icons.

methods.name: TooltipsDemo()
methods.description: Displays a button with a tooltip shown on hover.

methods.name: NavbarDemo
methods.description: Navigation bar with brand and links.

methods.name: SidebarDemo
methods.description: Sidebar with two navigation items.

methods.name: TabsDemo
methods.description: Tab navigation component with three tabs.

methods.name: BreadcrumbsDemo
methods.description: Displays a breadcrumb navigation path.

methods.name: PaginationDemo
methods.description: Pagination control with previous and next buttons.

methods.name: StepsDemo
methods.description: A stepper component showing two steps.

methods.name: InputDemo
methods.description: A controlled input for user name with display of typed value.

methods.name: SelectDemo
methods.description: A select dropdown with two options and the selected value displayed.

methods.name: CheckboxDemo
methods.description: A checkbox with label indicating subscription status.

methods.name: RadioDemo
methods.description: Radio button group with two options.

methods.name: TextAreaDemo
methods.description: A textarea input with placeholder.

methods.name: SwitchDemo
methods.description: A toggle switch button.

methods.name: DatePickerDemo
methods.description: A date input with displayed value.

methods.name: FileUploadDemo
methods.description: A file input with display of selected file name.

methods.name: RangeSliderDemo
methods.description: A range input slider with numeric display.

methods.name: AutocompleteDemo
methods.description: An autocomplete input filtering options based on user input.

methods.name: ValidationDemo
methods.description: An email input with validation indicator and error message.

methods.name: SimpleTableDemo
methods.description: A simple static table of names and roles.

methods.name: SortableTableDemo
methods.description: A table with sortable rows by name.

methods.name: DataTableDemo
methods.description: A filterable data table of names and roles.

methods.name: TableFilteringDemo
methods.description: A placeholder for filter input instructions.

ctags.name: inputField
ctags.pattern: /^ const inputField = 'w-full px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible/

ctags.name: secondaryBtn
ctags.pattern: /^ const secondaryBtn = 'px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 focus-visible:outlin/
